fields.name: AccountName
fields.description: The name of the global database account

fields.name: ApiType
fields.description: The API type of the restorable database account.

fields.name: CreationTime
fields.description: The creation time of the restorable database account (ISO-8601 format).

fields.name: DeletionTime
fields.description: The time at which the restorable database account has been deleted (ISO-8601 format).

fields.name: RestorableLocations
fields.description: List of regions where the of the database account can be restored from.
